Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: I remember clearly that I didn't order that with my tea.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Why did you serve this to me?

Choices.Choice1: You didn't tell you want one either
Choices.Choice2: In case you want some milk tea

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: You didn’t specify your milk choice to me, sir.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: In case you wish to have some milk tea instead, sir.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Which means I didn’t want one!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line2: It’s just black tea! No milk!
Speaker.line3: How on earth could you mess up a simple two-word order?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: I expect a more professional service from this Express, unlike this!
